tags: เกมล่าบัลลังก์
summary: Will Howland Reed’s Secrets Change the Course of ‘Game of Thrones’?
title: Will Howland Reed’s Secrets Change the Course of ‘Game of Thrones’?
excerpt: Meera and Jojen’s father has barely been on the show, but in Season 8, Ned’s former pal could reveal crucial information to more than one character
description:
We’ve only seen Howland Reed once – and that was in a flashback (courtesy of Bran Stark) at the Tower of Joy where Jon Snow was born. Howland is the only known living eyewitness to Jon Snow’s true identity. If Jon is skeptical of Bran’s Three-Eyed Raven omniscience and of Samwell Tarly’s research, only Howland can remove lingering doubts from his mind about his parentage.

The nature of the Reed keep, Greywater Watch, makes it impossible to find. And its lord has been reticent even through the turmoil which has engulfed The North for the past few years. If there is anyone who is able make contact with Howland Reed it may be Bran Stark with his superpowers.

blog.name: paceyrememberseverything
blog.title: Erica
blog.description: Wife. Dog Mom. Proud Auntie & Godmother. Unapologetic fangirl and multi-shipping enthusiast! Sansa Stark is Queen 🐺

body:
Bran & Jon

I’m curious as to how Jon will learn of his true parentage. So far, we’ve seen that Bran, as the 3ER, doesn’t have much tact when it comes to discussing what he’s seen (case in point, when he told Sansa she looked beautiful on the night she married Ramsay)


  • Sam knows the truth, will he help Bran with revealing R+L=J to Jon?
  • Will Sansa & Arya be told the truth before Jon’s arrival so they’ve had time to process and formulate a plan to best help protect him?
  • Will Sansa & Arya learn the truth the same time as Jon?


I just don’t want Bran to be all

“Hello Jon. I’m not Bran, I’m the 3ER. You’re probably wondering why you were having a panic attack mid thrust with D@ny …..well, it’s because she’s your Aunt. You’re not our brother, but our cousin. Lyanna was your mother, she secretly wed Rhaegar.”


Jon: 🤯🤯🤯

summary: "The smoke and ash clouded his eyes, and in the sky he saw a great winged snake whose roar was a river of flame. He bared his...
question: "The smoke and ash clouded his eyes, and in the sky he saw a great winged snake whose roar was a river of flame. He bared his teeth, but then the snake was gone." Bran VII, ACOK, when Winterfell burns. What is it he's seeing? It sounds like a dragon, but, well, that seems unlikely.
answer: Rorschach smoke blot. Summer’s seeing dragons in the flames and smoke like people see shapes in clouds. Only more ominous.

reblog.comment: Rorschach smoke blot. Summer’s seeing dragons in the flames and smoke like people see shapes in clouds. Only more ominous.

trail.content_raw: Rorschach smoke blot. Summer’s seeing dragons in the flames and smoke like people see shapes in clouds. Only more ominous.
trail.content: Rorschach smoke blot. Summer’s seeing dragons in the flames and smoke like people see shapes in clouds. Only more ominous.

summary: I was listening to the marvellous LML the other day and he was talking about men with Odin one-eyed symbolism: Bloodraven; Beric...
question: I was listening to the marvellous LML the other day and he was talking about men with Odin one-eyed symbolism: Bloodraven; Beric and Euron and I realised that two of the Starks Bran and Arya each had a connection to Bloodraven (Bran) and Beric (Arya) and that Dany has a foreshadowed connection to Euron. Do you think that this is foreshadowing that Arya, Dany and Bran will work together at some point?
answer:
I think it’s unlikely that Bloodraven, Beric and Euron and their link to one eye symbolism works as  a foreshadowing for Bran, Arya and Dany. First of all, Beric and Euron aren’t that important to Arya and Dany storylines, not as much as Bloodraven is to Bran ’s. If those two were mentoring the girls like Bloodraven is doing with Bran I could see them passing the one eye symbolism to their pupils and that serving as a link to those three. But that’s not the case. 


However I do believe that Bran, Arya and Dany will work together at some point. They are part of the key five Martin’s protagonists. Also they are all so responsible and care for their people so when the time calls it to fight against the Others those three will be among the first to respond.
